text: Niagara Falls (2021 population 94,415) is a city in Ontario, Canada. It is located on the Niagara River, across from Niagara Falls, New York. The city is dominated by the Niagara Falls. It brings hundreds of thousands of tourists to the city along with other attractions like Casino Niagara. ==History== The Niagara Falls area has seen continuous settlement since the 17th century, first by the Iroquois and then by the Europeans who were drawn to the falls. Tourism started in the early 19th century. This has always been the city's main industry. Category:Cities in Ontario
title: Niagara Falls, Ontario
